label: Surgical and Medical Equipment
description: Tools and equipment used in medical and surgical procedures.

subcategories.label: Scalpels and Blades
subcategories.description: Sharp surgical instruments used for making incisions.

subcategories.label: Clamps
subcategories.description: Tools used to hold objects in place during medical procedures.

subcategories.label: Scissors
subcategories.description: Tools used for cutting during medical procedures.

subcategories.label: Speculums
subcategories.description: Medical instruments used for examining body cavities.

subcategories.label: Dilators
subcategories.description: Medical instruments used to widen openings in the body.

subcategories.label: Masks
subcategories.description: Protective equipment used during medical procedures.

subcategories.label: Forceps
subcategories.description: Medical instruments used for grasping and holding objects.

subcategories.label: Pessaries
subcategories.description: Medical devices used to support organs or tissues.

subcategories.label: Tweezers
subcategories.description: Small medical instruments used for grasping and manipulating small objects.
